name: Cyber Bodies
description:
Gather your willpower and investigate the truth about your past in a harsh and gloomy cyberpunk-style world.
Take a closer look at others - who knows what goals they pursue and why they need you.
Have fun, kill, fuck and uncover the main secrets of your bodies!
Who knows what awaits you…



Cyber Bodies is a visual novel / Top-Down Shooter for adults, focused on colorful battles, which features:
✦ Interesting gameplay
✦ Memorable plot
✦ 13 Cyberpunk music tracks
✦ Various adult scenes with different girls, robots and sex toys.
✦ 13 unique enemies
✦ 3 unique weapons
